name: bodaciously

in a way that is very large or important, or that people enjoy or admire: The amusement park has a cool wave pool and a bodaciously awesome water slide. I can't get enough of the restaurant's bodaciously good food. Related word
bodacious
More examplesFewer examplesThe singer appeared on the red carpet dressed bodaciously in thigh-high boots. Try this product for shining, bodaciously full hair.You could tell that the athletes were all bodaciously fit even as they walked through the hotel lobby in street clothes.
